discount.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] re: teacher discounts
messages.msgSnippet: hi, i think it s 10 to 20 % but what is discount varies as well;  some pleces only class/educational stuff is;  and others it s everything so being really nice
messages.messageBody:
hi,

i think it's 10 to 20 % but what is discount varies as well;  some pleces only class/educational stuff is;  and others it's everything so being really nice to the clerk would probably not hurt:)
-susan

J & A Hayek wrote:

>I've gotten discounts at Barnes & Noble, Noodle Kidoodle, Borders, >and
>Holcomb's KnowPlace.  I have a membership  card from our local >home
schooling
>support group.  -Marcie

Thanks!  If you don't mind, I'd really like to know what type of discount.
Is it the same every time.  (like 20% off or something?)

Alyssa

vacpl@...
